title: Run bun loop and fix first blocker
description: Execute tools/bun_loop.sh, inspect latest summary, apply minimal fix for first failure trigger, verify via loop rerun, commit.

title: Ensure bun_loop writes summary on failure
description: Modify tools/bun_loop.sh so failed brew install still produces logs/bun/summary-*.txt (avoid set -e early exit), then continue loop parsing.

title: Bun loop: guard first network trigger
description: Run bun_loop, capture first network activity trigger, patch minimal guard/switch to prevent it, verify with next loop run, commit.

title: bun: fix first network-trigger report
description: Run bun loop, identify first trigger in latest summary, apply minimal guard/fix, verify, commit.

title: Bun loop: fix first blocker from latest run

title: Bun loop: patch first current blocker

title: Bun loop: patch first current blocker

title: Bun loop: patch first current blocker
description: Run tools/bun_loop.sh, inspect latest summary, fix only first blocker with minimal patch, verify, commit, close.

title: Bun loop: patch first fresh blocker
description: Run bun_loop, fix first failing blocker only, verify and commit

title: Bun loop: resolve first blocker after BuildHighway
